title: Much longer surfing than ever
description: The average surfing time increased from 2 minutes to 8 and a half. Customer questionnaires were decreased by 90%.

title:
More users,
easy checkout, more conversions
description: We saw a rise in conversion rate and bookings. And, that was a 7 times increase in comparison to the old site.

title: Vast growth in organic travelers
description: DWT saw its all-time high usage on the site backed by our strong SEO which eventually helped to grow the organic customers.

title:
Happy users,
happy customers, proud creators
description: The feedback from customers and clients were pretty amazing with a few flaws, which the team solved later on.
